title: Brent Scowcroft  | American Academy of Diplomacy

quotes: From 1982 to 1989, he was Vice Chairman of Kissinger Associates, Inc., an international consulting firm.

organizations.name: The Scowcroft Group
quotes: As President and founder of The Scowcroft Group and one of the country’s leading experts on international policy, Brent Scowcroft provides Group clients with unparalleled strategic advice and assistance in dealing in the international arena.

organizations.name: Kissinger Associates, Inc.
quotes: From 1982 to 1989, he was Vice Chairman of Kissinger Associates, Inc., an international consulting firm.

organizations.name: West Point
quotes: His prior extraordinary twenty-nine-year military career began with graduation from West Point and concluded at the rank of Lieutenant General following service as the Deputy National Security Advisor.
His Air Force service included Professor of Russian History at West Point;

organizations.name: Air Force
quotes: His Air Force service included Professor of Russian History at West Point; Assistant Air Attaché in Belgrade, Yugoslavia; Head of the Political Science Department at the Air Force Academy; Air Force Long Range Plans;

quotes: His Air Force service included Professor of Russian History at West Point; Assistant Air Attaché in Belgrade, Yugoslavia; Head of the Political Science Department at the Air Force Academy;

organizations.name: Office of the Secretary of Defense

organizations.name: Joint Chiefs of Staff
quotes: His Air Force service included Professor of Russian History at West Point; Assistant Air Attaché in Belgrade, Yugoslavia; Head of the Political Science Department at the Air Force Academy; Air Force Long Range Plans; Office of the Secretary of Defense International Security Assistance; Special Assistant to the Director of the Joint Chiefs of Staff;

organizations.name: President’s Advisory Committee on Arms Control
quotes: Out of uniform, he continued in a public policy capacity by serving on the President’s Advisory Committee on Arms Control, the Commission on Strategic Forces, and the President’s Special Review Board, also known as the Tower Commission.

quotes: Out of uniform, he continued in a public policy capacity by serving on the President’s Advisory Committee on Arms Control, the Commission on Strategic Forces, and the President’s Special Review Board, also known as the Tower Commission.

organizations.name: Columbia University
quotes: He earned his masters and doctorate in international relations from Columbia University.
